name: Proto Tower 374
description: I started this one a longass time ago, and just got around to finishing it. Two animated ones in a row is a nice way to get back into the swing of proto towers. I would like to make more proto towers because it is one of the most joyful things to do - just sit down and create a colorful architectural landscape with pixel art. I honestly think it's my favorite thing to do. Often creating animations can be a source of stress - as it requires a bit of planning and additional effort, but these little twinkly stars just came naturally. 🌃🌆🏙️

attributes.value: about 1 month or more, so at least 60x24x30=43,200
